commit_list.message:
#456

* add neknekb_mpmpd
* add option to redirect stdout
* add idsess to SIZE
* add error check for axi short test
* print time to exchange data for neknek
* fix filtering option #458

Import latest changes (#452)

* turn off projection for p by default
* return non-zero if an error occurs
* recompile if relevant makenek variabels changed
* turn off v projection for eddy_rich to pass regression testing

* add start script for MPMD neknek
* print div error outside of plan4
add MPI wrapper handling to maketools
switch off filtering if users put cutoff=1.0
do not promote real to real8 where not necessary

Import latest changes (#433)

* Replace KovSteady by KovStokes
* Changed default of short tests to 2 rank
* Add FsHydro short test
* Adjust to a meaningful tolerance for velocity
* Add projection for Helm3
* Add incl_def as short test
* Skip reading igroup
* Fix reading errors in nekmerge
* Add axhmsf to axhm timer
* Use env-vars instead of parsing maketools/makenek
* Correct max number of blocks for exo2nek
* Test against analytical solution in axi short test
* Set lastep even when IO is disabled
* Remove support for Cray compilers
* Remove some timers as the overhead is too large
* Add runtime check for eddy
* Fix to compile tools with IBM compilers
* Do a clean before we start the build process for short tests
* Create .f userfile with make instead of makenek

Import latest changes (#429)

* delete NATC
* use BDF for CVODE
* fix compiler flags for build target all
* introduce hard element limit for ASCII rea files
* introduce default values for FC and CC
disable ray_9 short test as we reach the logsize limit on Travis

Import latest changes (#414)

* add residual projection for scalars
* support TIME restart option for .f field files
* add gslib-v1.0.1
* avoid deleting 3rd-party tarballs
* make io_test also check time restart option
fix for proj if compiler uses aggressive vectorization
revert to old proj, fix proj for CHT

Import latest changes (#404)

* switch for FC instead of F77
* delete k-eps model
* build CVODE on demand
* fix gfldr for PnPn2
* disable checkpoints for iostep=0 or iotime=0
* make par reader more robust
* add support for elasticity solver in par file
* correct number of RK4 substeps for varying dt
* switch to new par v1.1
* introduce user specified Jacobian-vector product for CVODE
* add residual tolerance for field
* allow user to specify maximum number of elements in maketools
* fix byte_swapping issues introduced by #378
* add new projection scheme
* change nx1->lx1 etc.
* use projection in conj-ht
fix missing call to set_fdm_prec_h1A in case of PnPn
adjust interpolation tolerances to avoid residual stall in minimizer (#386)

WIP: import latest changes (#383)

* import Paul's projection fix
* replace realclean flag by user input
* install sundials package instead of cvode
* link against CVODE automatically

WIP: improved timers + genmap fix + defaut pressure settings (#376)

* compile amg_hype and exo2nek including external libs
* refactor PAPI interface to count FLOPs
* changed .par keyword AMG to SEMG_AMG
* set param(41-44)=0 by default irrespective of .rea
* compile tools with BIGMEM by default
* add counters users, users, addcol3, col2, col3, add2s2
* remove pressure solve from helm-counter
* enable mxm-counter
* fix restart issue with residual projection (#361)
* remove avg from tools
* add .his to cpn, mvn

changes for beta2

* enable BIGMEM by default, removed int_tp
* changed README/RELEASE document
* fixed handling for non-dssum fields
* makenek looks for .usr file automatically if there is just one
* improved error msg for PNPN and IFUSERVP=T
* fixed processor mapping bug reading .map file multiple times
turn on stress formulation automatically for Pn/Pn with variable properties
add call to CVODE for PnPn
use velocity tolerance for temperature if p20>0.1 to avoid unexpected bahviour if p20 is NORDER

Revert "add new binary .ma2 file, add timer for residual projection"

This reverts commit 7f2440ce17747530e75cafbea7722bb771366e8c.
add new binary .ma2 file, add timer for residual projection
do not use implicit none by default for zero.usr template
test hpts in Ethier short test
add missing variable declerations in hpts
use AMG preco for Ethier short test
Add conjugate heat transfer short test
remove call to print_stack on exit for portability reasons
Remove filtering for igeom=1 when using PNPN
enable exit handling for nek in gslib
read/write in .his instead of two file

* make IFAMG a runtime parameter
* compile libjl on demand
* fixed potential integer overflow
* add new usr interpolation wrapper
* changed to new SIZE format
* simplify build of amg_hypre
* increasing AMG read buffer size for better performance
fix name issue with binary fld

* Fix bug for multiple fld files into separate directories * Ensure null-terminated string is passed to C I/O routines * More descriptive subroutine names for re2 handling * Print troughtput instead of time to as a performance measure (#234)

* Ensure null-terminated string is passed to C I/O routines
* Print throughtput instead of time to as a performance measure

add missing argument to avoid SEGFAULT

WIP: various fixes (#223)

- Delete MOAB support
- Delete compile test as the executables may work on the compute node only
- Move stdout to the corresponding .re2 routines
- Make deformed elements the default
- Move makenek to bin to use it as default
- Exit makenek if any subcommands return a non-zero status
- Read his.in instead of hpts.in
- Output <casename>.his instead of hpts.out
- Make sure we always loop over nelt in fix_geom
- Delete old history point routines
- Do not call any compiled executables in makenek

* switch for FC instead of F77

commit_list.message:
Import latest changes (#433)

* Replace KovSteady by KovStokes
* Changed default of short tests to 2 rank
* Add FsHydro short test
* Adjust to a meaningful tolerance for velocity
* Add projection for Helm3

* Remove support for Cray compilers
* Remove some timers as the overhead is too large
* Add runtime check for eddy
* Fix to compile tools with IBM compilers

* Create .f userfile with make instead of makenek
